question: 下書き
sourceMnemonic: Something <kanji>below</kanji> your <kanji>writing</kanji> isn't what you want to necessarily publish to the world. It's below your writing, after all. This is merely a <vocabulary>rough draft</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is all kun'yomi vocab reading, as you can maybe guess from the hiragana sticking out. If you know the readings of the words <ja>下</ja> and <ja>書く</ja> separately, you should be able to combine them into one reading. Just don't forget the rendaku here!
